title: Launched on Backdrop Build V3!
content: We're thrilled to announce the debut of Warnify at Backdrop Build V3! This exciting hackathon provided the perfect platform to showcase the power of our ML/AI technology for spam detection. The fast-paced environment of Backdrop Build V3 allowed us to refine Warnify's capabilities and push the boundaries of spam protection. Stay tuned for further developments as we continue to build upon the success of Warnify at Backdrop Build V3!
author: Warnify Team
